reviewText: Good -- I used this in my 9th grade geo class as a filler while I was at a meeting, and the kids seemed to like it.  The Globe Trekker series is really done well.  I love Ian Wright -- he is by far the best "tour guide" and even though he isn't in this one it was still informative and fast-paced enough to keep the kids entertained.
Like the justine Shapiro hostess version better but love the content.  Train trips are always  exciting as part of a journey.
The host, Justine, seems pretty cranky in this DVD.  If they know that the Amish don't like being photographed/filmed, why did they film them so much?
